Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text. Joining 58921.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393510) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393510)
